assignment8mspaint

Class Rect

  • java.lang.Object
    • assignment8mspaint.Shape
      • assignment8mspaint.Rect

  • public class Rect
extends Shape
    This is the Rect class, extended from Shape, that is used to draw a Rectangle object on the canvas. Takes in 5 variables, then calls on the super class to store them and create the object. I, Sean Flannigan, student number 000270501, certify that all code submitted is my own work; that I have not copied it from any other source. I also certify that I have not allowed my work to be copied by others.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Rect(double x, double y, double width, double height, javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
      Rect constructor called from the main program, takes in 5 variables then passes those to its super class to store them and create the Rect object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void draw(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc)
      Draw method called from main program, uses the 5 stored variables in its super class to draw a filled in rectangle on the canvas, as well as a different colored border around the rectangle

      • Methods inherited from class assignment8mspaint.Shape

        getColor, getHeight, getWidth, getX, getY, setColor, setHeight, setWidth, setX, setY

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • Rect

        public Rect(double x,
            double y,
            double width,
            double height,
            javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
        Rect constructor called from the main program, takes in 5 variables then passes those to its super class to store them and create the Rect object
        Parameters:
        x - the x position on the canvas
        y - the y position on the canvas
        width - the width of the object
        height - the height of the object
        color - the color of the object

        gc - GraphicsContext
